name: Card-man
description:
What if Pac-man was a turn based, strategy card-game...?

You get this!

Instuctions:

  • Use the arrows on the left to move Pac-man around
  • To play a card, select it on the right and click "PLAY CARD"
  • You will be moved onto the next level once you've eaten all the dots/cherries
  • If the ghost gets you, the level will be reset and you'll lose a life
  • If you lose all your lives, the game ends.

This was made for a game jam, so I didn't have time to add menus or win/lose screens. This means that when you win/lose, the game just closes.
